policyname: Organization admins can manage pipeline columns
using_expression:
(org_id IN ( SELECT user_organizations.org_id
   FROM user_organizations
  WHERE ((user_organizations.user_id = ( SELECT auth.uid() AS uid)) AND (user_organizations.role = ANY (ARRAY['owner'::organization_role, 'admin'::organization_role, 'recruiter'::organization_role])))))

policyname: Users can view pipeline columns for their organization
using_expression:
(org_id IN ( SELECT user_organizations.org_id
   FROM user_organizations
  WHERE (user_organizations.user_id = ( SELECT auth.uid() AS uid))))
